message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth, I propose a starting price of $2000000. Let me know if this aligns with your interests, and we can proceed from there.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1500000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
